subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Chris Kunitz’s overtime power-play goal gave a 2-1 series lead to the Penguins, who withstood a boisterous Nassau Coliseum crowd and surges by the Islanders in the first and third periods.
snippet: Chris Kunitz’s overtime power-play goal gave a 2-1 series lead to the Penguins, who withstood a boisterous Nassau Coliseum crowd and surges by the Islanders in the first and third periods.
